#Mailcheap

[Mailcheap.co](https://www.mailcheap.co/) (Cyberlabs s.r.o. CZ & Cyberlabs Inc. USA) is an enterprise email solutions provider.

#What's new?

- Premium Mail now includes twice the storage w/ cloud & collaboration (Mail, Online Office, Video conferencing, etc.)
- Resell hosted email w/ WHMCS plugin
- Full support (L1/L3)

#Features (Premium Mail)

- **Unlimited Users**
- **Unlimited Domains**
- **Premium Relay Plus**
- **99.999% uptime SLA**
- **Cross DC Active-Active redundancy**
- **Failover in <2 min (90s avg.)**
- **High performance servers**
- **Triple data replication**
- Web based admin panel
- Advanced anti-spam & anti-virus protection (4-step filtration) w/ quarantine management
- Choice of three webmails: SOGo, Afterlogic & Cloud-webmail (50 MB att.)
- Cloud, Mail, Calendar, Contacts, Tasks, Group messaging, Video conferencing & Online office (supports editing all major document, spreadsheet & presentation file formats from your browser)
- WebMail, Contacts (CardDAV) & Calendar (CalDAV) w/ Exchange ActiveSync (SOGo)
- Sieve filtering, vacation auto responder, graphical stats
- SPF, DKIM, DMARC support
- IMAP, SMTP, POP, EAS support
- TLS for secure access & transmission
- Free setup & migration (1 file)
- DDoS protection
- RAID protection & offsite data replication
- Geo-redundant dual backup MX
- Fully Open source
- Comprehensive documentation
- Full support (L1/L3)


#Why Premium Mail?


Native High Availability Email, Cloud & Online Office


- Cross datacenter solution: keeps your service active & running even in case of an entire datacenter outage.
- Active-Active redundancy: helps reduce failover time (90s failover on avg.) in case of a host/network outage.
- Triple data replication: helps ensure data integrity at all times.
- [Premium relay+](https://www.mailcheap.co/relays.html): Enjoy higher sending limits and ensure near 100% deliverability to all major providers and ESPs through Mailcheap's multi-relay system which resends hard rejects.
- Advanced anti-spam & anti-virus protection: 4-step filtration process checks headers, mime and attachments for banned items, viruses and spam.
- Online office supports all major document, spreadsheet and presentation file formats and works in all modern browsers.
- See [features](https://www.mailcheap.co/features.html) and [infrastructure](https://www.mailcheap.co/infrastructure.html) for more information and [status](https://www.mailcheap.co/status.html) to verify uptime stats.
